name: lib/schema.js
Schema
description:
define the structure of your data,
schema specific methods,
indexes / constrains,
hooks,
validation,
relationships,

name: constructor
description: Used to initialize a new schema.

name: validate
description: Function to use for validating a node

params.name: node
params.description: The node that will be evaluated

return.description: node - The evaluated node with added or removed properties.

throws.description: error - Thrown if an node violates the constraints given by the schema.

name: relation
description: Adds an instance relationship to documents constructed from Models compiled from this schema.

params.name: name
params.description: name for the specified relationsship, or an object of muliple relationsships.

params.name: fn
params.description: relationsship to be added to the schema.
